name: Catch Bomb
description:
You think you have reflexes? They will be put to the test in this game, and you'll be amazed by its speed!

BOMBS ARE EVERYWHERE, grab them all and avoid crates!
CUT parachutes to rid your screen as soon as possible and earn maximum points!

Three qualities are necessary to crush your score:
- SPEED
- AGILITY
- ANTICIPATION
Will you be the best?
